it.ncorti.emgvisualizer.model

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.ncorti.emgvisualizer.model.Sensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyoSensor

    public abstract class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for handling an hardware concrete sensor
    Author:
    Nicola Corti

      • getUpdateEvent

        public abstract SensorUpdateEvent getUpdateEvent(RawDataPoint point)
        Return concrete subclass instance of a SensorUpdateEvent

        This method is necessary due to event system design

        Parameters:
        point - New point related to update event
        Returns:
        The new SensorUpdateEvent

      • getRangeEvent

        public abstract SensorRangeEvent getRangeEvent(float minValue,
                                               float maxValue)
        Return concrete subclass instance of a SensorRangeEvent

        This method is necessary due to event system design

        Parameters:
        minValue - New min value
        maxValue - New max value
        Returns:
        The new SensorUpdateEvent
